Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a player. Can be a computer or human-controlled character.
    Author:
    Daniel Neel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(int playerNumber, IdeopolyGUI gui)
      Actions to take when a player object is initially created.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(int playerNumber,
      IdeopolyGUI gui)
        Actions to take when a player object is initially created. Players are only created at the start of the game. Different players start at different positions on the board (Same cell, different walking space.)

    • Method Detail

      • getCash

        public java.lang.String getCash(java.lang.String billType)
        Get the amount of bills of the given type for this player.

      • addProperty

        public void addProperty(BoardCell property)
        Give this player a new property.

      • removeProperty

        public void removeProperty(BoardCell property)
        Remove a property from this player.

      • roll

        public void roll()
        Have this player roll the dice.

      • getImage

        public javax.swing.Icon getImage()
        Return the image associated with this player.

      • getCell

        public BoardCell getCell()
        Get this player's current position.

      • changeCell

        public void changeCell(int index,
              IdeopolyGUI gui)
        Move this player to a given position q. q refers to the cell the Player wants to move to. For example, changePosition(3) will move any player to the 4th BoardCell on the board.

      • addCash

        public void addCash(java.lang.String t,
           int a)
        Change this player's amount a of currency type t.

      • giveGOOJF

        public void giveGOOJF()
        Give this player a get out of jail free card.

      • spendGOOJF

        public void spendGOOJF()
        Have this player spend one of their get out of jail free cards.

      • getNumGOOJFCards

        public int getNumGOOJFCards()
        Return the number of GOOJF cards this player owns.

      • getJailStatus

        public int getJailStatus()
        See what week of jail this person is in.

      • setJailStatus

        public void setJailStatus(int weeks)
        Set the value of this Player's inJail property.

      • getNumHouses

        public int getNumHouses()
        Get the number of houses this player owns.

      • getNumHotels

        public int getNumHotels()
        Get the number of hotels this player owns.

      • willBankrupt

        public java.lang.Boolean willBankrupt(int amount)
        Determine if the given amount will bankrupt this Player if (s)he has to pay it. Return True if Player will be bankrupted, False otherwise.

      • spreadCash

        public void spreadCash(int numToSwitch)
        Convert this Player's cash into bill type numToSwitch. For example, if a Player needs more 5s, this will convert all the Player's cash to 5s. By default (with an invalid argument), converts to 500s.

      • bankruptPlayer

        public void bankruptPlayer()
        Bankrupt this player.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Get the name of this Player.

      • getNumOwnedProperties

        public int getNumOwnedProperties()
        Get the number of properties this Player owns.

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex()
        Get the index of the BoardCell in boardProperties[] this Player is standing on.

      • putInJail

        public void putInJail(IdeopolyGUI gui)
        Put the given Player p in jail, and enable the "Use get out of jail free card" button if the Player is the human player.
